sentence: ? MI-03: Republican Rep. Peter Meijer announced last week that he would defend the newly drawn 3rd District, which Michigan's new map transforms from a 51-47 Trump seat to a constituency Joe Biden would have carried 53-45.
title: Morning Digest: Redistricting scrambled California's House map. Here's our guide to unscrambling it

sentence: From the January/February 2022 issue: Tim Alberta on Peter Meijer and what the GOP does to its own dissenters There are different truths in politicsTrumps truth, Bidens truth, whatever, B.J.
author: Tim Alberta
title: How Politics Poisoned the Evangelical Church
